title: UI change + Playwright verification
description: Workflow for implementing a UI/i18n/meta change in the Hugo site and verifying it with a Python Playwright + pytest test that hits `hugo server`.

title.description: Issue title, written as an imperative task.

what_to_test.description: Concrete assertions the Playwright test must verify (selectors/attributes/content).

steps.title: {{title}}
steps.body:
## Implementation
- Implement the change in Hugo templates/content/assets.

## Playwright verification
- Add/extend a pytest test in `tests/playwright/tests/`.
- Test should start `hugo server` (or reuse fixture) and verify:
  - {{what_to_test}}

## Validation
- `make build`
- `uv run -m pytest` from `tests/playwright/`
